title: Sated devourer bug
body:
There is a bug with{{item:3933}} and other devourer items that i recently found.
When you die with sated devourer you can sell it then re buy it wait 5 sec then click undo and you will keep all of the stats from sated devourer

replies.body: I'm downvoting just so no one finds out. Please remove this thread, before people know.....especially members of Riot.
